page.title: 16HORNS FARM
page.content:
{Map ref:- 869048 {}
Horns Farm is a combination of riding stables and cows for milk and beef purposes. There are 78 acres on which the 50 cows graze.Some are reared for beef,the rest produce 280 gallons of milk per day,which is pasteurised at Stroud Creamery.The milk is then returned to the farmer who has a milk delivery round. There is enough hay for the stables and for selling locally .The livery stables have 20 horses for hire in the area. The farmer owns a tractor,baler,hay spreader,and a mowing machine. He also has some domestic animals.
